Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the lantibiotic family (Class I bacteriocin)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus cereus Z4222, Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Geobacillin II only demonstrated antimicrobial activity against Bacillus strains.

Literature.Title: Lantibiotics from Geobacillus thermodenitrificans.
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2012 Apr 3;109(14)5241-5246.
Literature.Author: Garg N, Tang W, Goto Y, Nair SK, van der Donk WA.
